page.title: 10BOROUGHBRIDGE HOUSES
page.content: The houses in Boroughbridge are now up to a modern standard but there are still a lot of houses and cottages over three hundred years old. Now adays bricks are used from different parts of England but before they were made from brick yards in the local area. The roofs are made in tiles or slates. There are two types, one made out of blue slate and the other type is made out of clay. In and around the country there are semi-detached, detached and terraced houses. I live in a cottage it is over three hundred years old. On the roof it has slates.
